| ---------- | ---------- | ----------- | --------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `disabled` | `disabled` |             | `boolean`             | `undefined`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |
| `el`       | --         |             | `HTMLTextAreaElement` | `(() => {     let value = this.value ? this.value.toString() : '';      // create new element     const textarea = document.createElement('textarea');     if (value) {       textarea.value = value;     }      textarea.setAttribute('slot', this.slotName);     textarea.addEventListener('input', e => {       this.value = (e.target as HTMLTextAreaElement).value;     });      for (let key of [       'font-size',       'line-height',       'font-family',       'font-weight',       'white-space',       'word-break'     ]) {       textarea.style.setProperty(key, 'inherit', 'important');     }      textarea.style.setProperty('height', '100%', 'important');     this.host.prepend(textarea);     return textarea;   })()` |
| `value`    | `value`    |             | `string`              | `''`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
